```{r}
library(tidyverse)

d <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/difiore/ada-datasets/main/data-wrangling.csv")

names(d)

s <- select(d, 1:3)

ggplot(d, aes(x = d[[1]], y = d[[2]])) +
  geom_point()
```
